attributes.action: stop the war in iraq now. do not be a part of this sickness.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: most of us are unable to believe the horror that is happening every second of every day in iraq. but it is happening, and to people just like us. even the time it has take me to quickly write this is too long for the war to have carried on, STOP IT NOW.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
